data.text: @feistywomankent That would absolutely be the best solution but we know that Archers characters (most) always opt for the least sensible route! 😟

@asteroidchick Mm Lizzie is far too emotional to deal rationally with this. Why doesn’t she confide in big brother David and he could have a chat with Russ? Nothing macho just a adult discussion about the fallout for Russ & the kindest way to end this. #TheArchers
@Libmoggy Oh to be a fly on that wall!
@asteroidchick Elizabeth now knows where he lives. I wonder if his village shop has a Susan #thearchers
